glsa.title: DCRaw: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow in DCRaw might allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Command-line decoder for raw digital photos.

description.p: An integer overflow was discovered in the ljpeg_start function in DCRaw.

impact.p: Remote attackers, by enticing a user to open a specially crafted image, could cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All DCRaw users should upgrade to the latest version:
